Resignation / Retirement
Process
The University’s resignation and retirement
process is shown below:
Faculty submits letter of resignation thru Channel
(1 month before resignation)
Approval of the resignation letter by Higher Authority
Accomplish University Clearance
Submit documents for resignation - Certificate of employment - ID -GSIS benefits/Terminal Leave benefits, etc.
